EmailTemplate.name: Increase ROI with Billing Programs.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow's Webinar Reminder: Increasing Your ROI Using Your EMS Billing Programs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Upcoming Webinar Reminder Increasing your ROI Using your EMS Billing Programs
This is a reminder that you have registered for the complimentary webinar on Increasing Your Return on Investment Using Your EMS Billing Programs. This webinar will discuss how Larry Cole and TJ Irby, both EMS Billing Experts, used their EMS Billing Programs to increase revenues in their respective services.
Another reminder email with your join link (below), will be sent out tomorrow - 20 minutes before we start.
We look forward to having you attend!
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/ccmcvmt DATE: October 20, 2011 TIME: 2 PM Eastern | 1 PM Central l Noon Mountain | 11 AM Pacific PRESENTER: Larry Cole and TJ Irby - both EMS Billing Service Experts AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you login
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
